description: First owner, maintained throughout at the agents. This is the first Mazda3 that was imported to Sri Lanka. Superbly maintained and accident free. It still has the original paint. Tyres recently replaced. 3M original tint. Standard options include MDD Connect with Bluetooth Streaming, Hands Free, USB, Rain sensing wipers, Auto Lights, Cruise Control and more. Price negotiable. Quick Sale.
name: Mazda Mazda3  2014
